content: TE 500 SDS-Max chipping hammer Robust SDS Max (TE-Y) demolition hammer for light-duty chiseling in concrete and masonry ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Demolition hammers and breakers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Robust tool with extra protection against heat and dust – prolonging the lifetime and lowering repair costs Low weight and compact design for easy handling Great performance to weight ratio – so you get a powerful breaker which is much less tiring to use Detachable supply cord for quick and easy replacement of damaged/broken cords on the jobsite Optional DRS-B dust removal system collects up to 95% of dust Applications Chiseling on concrete and masonry walls Creating channels in concrete and masonry to install pipes and cables Light chipping and tile removal Enlarging breaches Light-duty wall demolition ### TECHNICAL DATA: Working direction: Wall Tool chuck type: TE-Y (SDS Max) Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery: 10.8 lb. Technical Data | Working direction | Wall | Tool chuck type | TE-Y (SDS Max) | Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery | 10.8 lb | Single impact energy | 5.2 ft-lbs | Full hammering frequency | 3228 impacts/minute | Max. chiseling performance | 52 in³/min | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 16.5 x 4.1 x 9.4 in | Triaxial vibration for chiseling into concrete | 13.5 m/s² | 1 | Dust removal system available | TE DRS-B | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 92 dB (A) | 2 | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 3702267 - TE 500 Performance Package - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 500 (03) 120V Breaker - 1x TE Standard Supply Cord 13 (4m) - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml - 1x TE 500 Tool case assy - 2x Flat chisel TE-Y FM 40 - 2x Pointed chisel TE-Y SM 36 - 1x TE Standard Supply Cord 13 (4m) - 2224977 - Breaker TE 500 120V - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 500 (03) 120V Breaker - 1x TE Standard Supply Cord 13 (4m) - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml - 1x TE 500 Tool case assy
